strings.Value: "I am loyal to my subjects, not to a group of crazy fanatics!"
"Stop! You don't know what you're doing!"
[Draw your weapon] "Save your breath. Even better â€” let's dance!"
[Attack] "I will gut every one of you, and hang your entrails around the capital, to teach the other idiots a lesson!"
"It's too late to offer peace and friendship, isn't it?"

{n}The face of the First Faithful, lit by torches, looks like a horrible mask, disfigured by rage and furious triumph.{/n} "What do you say, baron{mf||ess}? Are you prepared to sacrifice your useless life for these people, who you claim to care about?"
{n}Tristian clenches his holy symbol of Sarenrae.{/n} "I'm afraid it's too late for words..."
{n}Yelling and swinging their weapons, the crowd attacks!{/n}
"I think you know the answer to this question..."
"Bwa ha ha! I love your style!"
